entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bécancour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:48 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
